General.Name: PT Buana Artha Anugerah Tbk
General.Description: PT Buana Artha Anugerah Tbk operates as an asset management company in Indonesia. The company offers mutual funds, money market instruments, and fixed income securities. It also engages in the trading business. The company was formerly known as PT Star Petrochem, Tbk and changed its name to PT Buana Artha Anugerah Tbk in June 2019. PT Buana Artha Anugerah Tbk was founded in 2008 and is based in Jakarta Pusat, Indonesia.
